mapper.select: select * from ( select o.*, u.user_name from tbl_order o inner join tbl_user u on o.user_no = u.user_no) where (order_lat between #{order_lat} - 0.013 and #{order_lat} + 0.013) and (order_lng between #{order_lng} - 0.013 and #{order_lng} + 0.013) and order_state = '3-001' order by order_no desc
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_order(order_no, order_ca, order_req, order_lat, order_lng, user_no) values(seq_order_no.nextval, #{order_ca}, #{order_req}, #{order_lat}, #{order_lng}, #{user_no})
mapper.update: update tbl_order set order_state='3-004' where order_no = #{order_no}
